scripts.postinstall: (cd vpc-with-pg && npm install); (cd vpc-with-pg/lib/layers/pg-dbschema-layer/nodejs && npm install); (cd pg-with-graphile && npm install); (cd pg-with-graphile/lib/layers/pg-as-datasource-layer/nodejs/ && npm install)
scripts.deploy-vpc-rds: (cd vpc-with-pg && npm run cdk deploy -- --all -O output.json)
